mapper.update: update lg_warehouse set transferStationId = #{transferstationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, warehouseNumber = #{warehousenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warehouseName = #{warehousename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warehouseArea = #{warehousearea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, heapHeight = #{heapheight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, openingDate = #{openingdate,jdbcType=DATE}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where warehouseId = #{warehouseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select warehouseId, transferStationId, warehouseNumber, warehouseName, warehouseArea, heapHeight, openingDate, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_warehouse where warehouseId = #{warehouseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select warehouseId, transferStationId, warehouseNumber, warehouseName, warehouseArea, heapHeight, openingDate, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_warehouse
